archiefmat.scope: Letter book of correspondence from ?? to various authorities and private individuals in the colony. Subjects concern public order, administration of justice, slaves, maroons etc. An alphabetical index names and subjects is included; in the index reference is made to the numbers of the letters. The ordered according to these numbers.
archiefmat.notes:
An alphabetical index of names and subjects is included.

The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
